wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Arthur Pilcher GCMG (16 May 1912 – 10 February 1990) was a British diplomat, capping a long career with a posting as Her Majesty's ambassador to the Philippines (1959–1963), Austria (1965–1967) and Japan (1967–1972).

response: * John Arthur Pilcher  (1912–1990), diplomat, ambassador to Austria (1965–67), ambassador to Japan (1967–1972)
